attributes.action: Act on the results of the Cross Party Parliamentary Inquiry into British Nuclear tests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Take action on the report of the cross party MPs Parliamentary Inquiry held last October.  In particular commission an immediate investigation into the continued damage to veterans childrens health as a result of their fathers exposure during the nuclear tests in the Pacific and Australia and after through serving at the contaminated area known as Maralinga South Australia.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
